Translations.Text: Ami manusa srsti karechi ebam tara mana nibhrte ye kucinta kare, se sambandhe'o ami abagata achi. Ami tara gribasthita dhamani theke'o adhika nikatabarti.
Yakhana du'i pheresata dane o bame base tara amala grahana kare.
Se ye katha'i uccarana kare, ta'i grahana karara jan'ye tara kache sada prastuta prahari rayeche.
Mrtyuyantrana niscita'i asabe. E theke'i tumi talabahana karate.
Ebam singaya phumtkara deya habe eta habe bhaya pradarsanera dina.
Pratyeka byakti agamana karabe. Tara sathe thakabe calaka o karmera saksi.
Tumi to e'i dina samparke udasina chile. Ekhana tomara kacha theke yabanika sariye diyechi. Phale aja tomara drsti sutiksna.
Tara sangi pheresata balabeh amara kache ye, amalanama chila, ta e'i.
Tomara ubhaye'i niksepa kara jahanname pratyeka akrtajna birud'dhabadike
ye badha dita mangalajanaka kaje, simalanghanakari, sandeha posanakarike.
Ye byakti allahara sathe an'ya upasya grahana karata, take tomara kathina sastite niksepa kara.
Tara sangi sayatana balabeh he amadera palanakarta, ami take abadhyataya lipta karini. Bastutah se nije'i chila sudura pathabhrantite lipta.
Allaha balabenah amara samane bakabitanda karo na ami to purbe'i tomaderake ayaba dbara bhaya pradarsana karechilama.
Amara kache katha radabadala haya na ebam ami bandadera prati julumakari na'i.
Yedina ami jahannamake jijnasa karaba; tumi ki purna haye gecha? Se balabeh ara'o ache ki
jannatake upasthita kara habe khodabhirudera adure.
Tomadera pratyeka anuragi o smaranakarike era'i pratisruti deya hayechila.
Ye na dekhe dayamaya allaha taâ€™alake bhaya karata ebam binita antare upasthita hata.
Tomara ete santite prabesa kara. Eta'i anantakala basabasera jan'ya prabesa karara dina.
Tara tathaya ya ca'ibe, ta'i pabe ebam amara kache rayeche ara'o adhika.
